name: Temple Of Tozi
description:
A puzzle game in which you use "unstable" platforms to progress through the temple.  Swing your Macuahuitl to push the platforms to help you find a way deeper into the temple.

Update: Fixed broken platform on last level and charge bug

Controls

  • At any time press R to restart that screen. 
  • A & D or arrow keys for movement
  • W or Up arrow or Space to Jump
  • X or Left mouse button to Swing

How To Play

You can hit platforms to send them in the opposite direction. Once they hit a wall or another platform they will stay there a short while represented by the decreasing green bar (platforms with purple bars have a higher count down). You can then use the platform in its new position before it resets after the bar runs out.

 You can hit the platforms left or right just by swinging from the opposite direction. To hit them up or down you will have to hold X to go into the charge pose then jump or press down/S.
